item.description:
Here's an opportunity to see our talented students in action. Join us in enjoying a play directed by Laurence Senelick and staring Tufts undergraduates at the Balch Arena Theater.

Part farce, part telenovela, part sardonic commentary on Columbia's history of terrorism, drug trafficking, and serial killers, Our Private Lives features a family even more dysfunctional family than the Kardashians. Their seething cauldron of personal secrets and lies bubbles over into a satire on a whole society rapidly undergoing change.

Tickets are only $1.

(Note: RSVP separately for the Jumbo Dinner prior to this event.)
item.name: Jumbo Theater: Our Private Lives
